Description_lang: $?s202028[Shred and Brutal Slash]?a137011[Shred and Swipe][]$?a137011[ grant Ursine Potential. When you have $441695s1 stacks, the next time you transform into Bear Form, your next Mangle deals $441698s1% increased damage or your next Swipe deals $441698s2% increased damage. Either generates ${$442562s1/10} extra Rage.][Mangle grants Feline Potential. When you have $441701s1 stacks, the next time you transform into Cat Form, gain $441704s1 combo points and your next Ferocious Bite or Rip deals $441702s1% increased damage for its full duration.]

description_blz.en_US: Mangle grants Feline Potential. When you have 6 stacks, the next time you transform into Cat Form, gain 5 combo points and your next Ferocious Bite or Rip deals 200% increased damage for its full duration.
description_blz.es_MX: Destrozar otorga Potencial felino. Cuando tienes 6 acumulaciones, la próxima vez que adoptes la forma felina, obtienes 5 p. de combo y tu siguiente Mordedura feroz o Destripar inflige un 200% más de daño durante toda su duración.
description_blz.pt_BR: Destroçar concede Potencial Felino. Com 6 aplicações, ao assumir a Forma de Felino novamente, você ganha 5 pontos de combo, e sua próxima Mordida Feroz ou Rasgar causa 200% a mais de dano por toda a duração.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Zerfleischen' gewährt 'Katzenpotenzial'. Wenn Ihr 6 Stapel habt und das nächste Mal Katzengestalt annehmt, erhaltet Ihr 5 Combopunkte, und Euer nächster Einsatz von 'Wilder Biss' oder 'Zerfetzen' verursacht während der gesamten Dauer 200% mehr Schaden.
description_blz.en_GB: Mangle grants Feline Potential. When you have 6 stacks, the next time you transform into Cat Form, gain 5 combo points and your next Ferocious Bite or Rip deals 200% increased damage for its full duration.
description_blz.es_ES: Destrozar otorga Potencial felino. Cuando tengas 6 acumulaciones, la próxima vez que utilices Forma felina, recibirás 5 puntos de combo, y tu siguiente Mordedura feroz o Destripar infligirá un 200% más de daño hasta que termine.
description_blz.fr_FR: Mutilation accorde Potentiel félin. À 6 charges, vous obtenez 5 points de combo au prochain passage en forme de félin et la prochaine Morsure féroce ou Déchirure inflige 200 % de dégâts supplémentaires pour toute sa durée.
description_blz.it_IT: Dilaniamento fornisce Potenzialità Felina. Al raggiungimento di 6 accumuli, mutare in Forma Felina fornisce 5 punti combo e il successivo Morso Feroce o Squarcio infligge il 200% di danni aggiuntivi per tutta la durata del suo effetto.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Увечье" дает эффект "Кошачий потенциал". Когда вы накапливаете 6 эффектов и принимаете облик кошки, вы получаете +5 к серии приемов, а следующая способность "Свирепый укус" или "Разорвать" наносит на 200% больше урона за время действия.
description_blz.ko_KR: 짓이기기 사용 시 표범의 잠재력이 부여됩니다. 6번 중첩되면 다음에 표범으로 변신할 때 연계 점수 5점을 생성하고 다음 흉포한 이빨 또는 도려내기가 전체 지속시간 동안 200%의 추가 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 割碎會賦予靈貓潛能。當你有6層效果時，你下一次變身為獵豹形態後，獲得5個連擊點數，且你的下一個兇猛撕咬或撕扯在完整持續時間內造成的傷害提高200%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 裂伤会赋予灵猫潜能。当你达到6层，下一次变为猎豹形态时，获得5点连击点数，并且你的下一次凶猛撕咬或割裂期间造成的伤害提高200%。
